name: Tom Cruise
body: Very comfortable. The sizing is true.

name: Chris Hemsworth
body: I have received my shoes! They perfectly fit to my feet and feel so great.

name: Henry Cavill
body: No doubt, I have tried them a shot a second time.

name: Chris Evans
body: Best quality product. I absolutely adore this company and these shoes

name: Vin Diesel
body: I thought they were expensive when I bought them. Excellent product

name: Leonardo Dicaprio
body: They are VERY, VERY well made. I will buy again
